component.name: SpineGuard
component.summary: Back health Pomodoro timer with enforced full-screen breaks

description.p: SpineGuard uses a modified Pomodoro technique designed around back health. Every 25 minutes, a full-screen overlay appears prompting you to take a break. Breaks alternate between walking and lying down to encourage movement, relieve pressure, and counteract prolonged sitting.

ul.li: Full-screen break overlays that cannot be dismissed early
Guided exercise routines (McKenzie extensions, posture resets, spinal decompression)
Sit-stand desk mode with position switch reminders
Idle and screen lock detection with auto-pause
System tray icon with live countdown

description.p: Initial release with Pomodoro breaks, guided exercise routines, sit-stand desk mode, water/supplement reminders, idle detection, multi-monitor support, and system tray integration.
